description.value: Monkey Paw... this paw grants wishes. Each finger stands for one, and once a wish is spent, the finger locks tight, stiff as bone. It gives you what you asked for, aye, but it takes the spirit of your words and twists it like a rope. I knew a caravan master who begged for endless gold. He got it, but it rained from the skies as molten coins, burning his camp to ash. By the time youâ€™re on the last finger, most folk would sooner beg for death than ask another boon.
